content:
how about for:

Big Boys Long Sleeve Full Zip Hoodie

This cozy hoodie is crafted from a warm cotton blend and features our signature embroidered pony. The attached hood and kangaroo pocket helps this hoodie to be as practical as it is cool, ready for any adventures the day has in store. Ribbed at the cuffs and hemline for comfort and easy wear, there are endless outfits choices that this hoodie can combine with for snug and cozy style season to season.

Imported
Full-zip front
Hood
Ribbed hem
Signature embroidered pony accents the left chest
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs
Split kangaroo pocket
Ralph Lauren boys' hoodie
Size & Fit
Size medium has a 22.25" body length and a 28.5" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck.
Materials & Care
Machine washable
Cotton/polyester

ordered it took 5 days to come got 14-16 Large felt like a 10-12 medium slightly small I recommend getting a size upper
